mapper.insert: INSERT INTO note_tag (name, color, user_id, create_time) VALUES (#{name}, #{color}, #{userId}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE note_tag SET name=#{name}, color=#{color}, user_id=#{userId}, create_time=#{createTime} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, color, user_id, create_time FROM note_tag WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT id, name, color, user_id, create_time FROM note_tag ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, name, color, user_id, create_time FROM note_tag WHERE user_id=#{userId}
